verses.verse: שִׁ֖יר <WH7892> shir A Song מִזְמ֣וֹר <WH4210> miz-Mor [or] Psalm לְדָוִֽד׃ <WH1732> le-da-Vid. of David נָכ֣וֹן <WH3559> na-Chon is fixed לִבִּ֣י <WH3820> lib-Bi my heart אֱלֹהִ֑ים <WH430> E-lo-Him; O God אָשִׁ֥ירָה <WH7891> 'a-Shi-rah I will sing וַ֝אֲזַמְּרָ֗ה <WH2167> va-'a-zam-me-Rah, and give praise אַף־ <WH637> 'af- even כְּבוֹדִֽי׃ <WH3519> ke-vo-Di. even with my glory
ע֭וּרָֽה <WH5782> 'U-rah Awake הַנֵּ֥בֶל <WH5035> han-Ne-vel psaltery וְכִנּ֗וֹר <WH3658> ve-chin-Nor, and harp אָעִ֥ירָה <WH5782> 'a-'I-rah I [myself] will awake שָּֽׁחַר׃ <WH7837> Sha-char. early

אוֹדְךָ֖ <WH3034> 'od-Cha I will praise בָעַמִּ֥ים׀ <WH5971> va-'am-Mim among the people יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> Yah-weh; thee O LORD וַ֝אֲזַמֶּרְךָ֗ <WH2167> va-'a-zam-mer-cha, and I will sing praises בַּל־ <WH1077> bal- among אֻמִּֽים׃ <WH3816> 'um-Mim. unto thee among the nations

כִּֽי־ <WH3588> ki- for גָד֣וֹל <WH1419> ga-Dol [is] great מֵֽעַל־ <WH5921> me-'al- and שָׁמַ֣יִם <WH8064> sha-Ma-yim above the heavens חַסְדֶּ֑ךָ <WH2617> chas-De-cha; For thy mercy וְֽעַד־ <WH5704> ve-'ad- to שְׁחָקִ֥ים <WH7834> she-cha-Kim [reacheth] unto the clouds אֲמִתֶּֽךָ׃ <WH571> 'a-mit-Te-cha. and thy truth

ר֣וּמָה <WH7311> Ru-mah Be thou exalted עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- above שָׁמַ֣יִם <WH8064> sha-Ma-yim above the heavens אֱלֹהִ֑ים <WH430> E-lo-Him; O God וְעַ֖ל <WH5921> ve-'Al above כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- all הָאָ֣רֶץ <WH776> ha-'A-retz above all the earth כְּבוֹדֶֽךָ׃ <WH3519> ke-vo-De-cha. and thy glory

לְ֭מַעַן <WH4616> Le-ma-'an because of יֵחָלְצ֣וּן <WH2502> ye-chal-Tzun may be delivered יְדִידֶ֑יךָ <WH3039> ye-di-Dei-cha; That thy beloved הוֹשִׁ֖יעָה <WH3467> ho-Shi-'ah save יְמִֽינְךָ֣ <WH3225> ye-mi-ne-Cha [with] thy right hand וַעֲנֵֽנִי׃ <WH6030> va-'a-Ne-ni. and answer

אֱלֹהִ֤ים׀ <WH430> E-lo-Him God דִּבֶּ֥ר <WH1696> dib-Ber hath spoken בְּקָדְשׁ֗וֹ <WH6944> be-ka-de-Sho, in his holiness אֶעְלֹ֥זָה <WH5937> 'e'-Lo-zah I will rejoice אֲחַלְּקָ֥ה <WH2505> 'a-chal-le-Kah I will divide שְׁכֶ֑ם <WH7927> she-Chem; Shechem וְעֵ֖מֶק <WH6010> ve-'E-mek the valley סֻכּ֣וֹת <WH5523> suk-Kot of Succoth אֲמַדֵּֽד׃ <WH4058> 'a-mad-Ded. and mete out

לִ֤י li גִלְעָ֨ד׀ <WH1568> gil-'Ad Gilead לִ֤י li מְנַשֶּׁ֗ה <WH4519> me-nash-Sheh, [is] mine Manasseh וְ֭אֶפְרַיִם <WH669> Ve-'ef-ra-yim [is] mine Ephraim מָע֣וֹז <WH4581> ma-'oz also [is] the strength רֹאשִׁ֑י <WH7218> ro-Shi; of mine head יְ֝הוּדָ֗ה <WH3063> ye-hu-Dah, Judah מְחֹקְקִֽי׃ <WH2710> me-cho-ke-Ki. [is] my lawgiver

מוֹאָ֤ב׀ <WH4124> mo-'Av Moab סִ֬יר <WH5518> sir caldron רַחְצִ֗י <WH7366> rach-Tzi, is My washbowl עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- Over אֱ֭דוֹם <WH123> 'E-dom over Edom אַשְׁלִ֣יךְ <WH7993> 'ash-Lich will I cast out נַעֲלִ֑י <WH5275> na-'a-Li; my shoe עֲלֵֽי־ <WH5921> 'a-lei- Over פְ֝לֶ֗שֶׁת <WH6429> fe-Le-shet, over Philistia אֶתְרוֹעָֽע׃ <WH7321> et-ro-'A'. will I triumph

מִ֣י <WH4310> mi Who יֹ֭בִלֵנִי <WH2986> Yoi-le-ni Who will bring עִ֣יר <WH5892> 'ir Ai מִבְצָ֑ר <WH4013> miv-Tzar; me into the strong מִ֖י <WH4310> mi Who נָחַ֣נִי <WH5148> na-Cha-ni will lead עַד־ <WH5704> 'ad- against אֱדֽוֹם׃ <WH123> e-Dom. Edom

הֲלֹֽא־ <WH3808> ha-lo- O אֱלֹהִ֥ים <WH430> E-lo-Him [Wilt] not [thou] O God זְנַחְתָּ֑נוּ <WH2186> ze-nach-Ta-nu; [who] hast cast us off וְֽלֹא־ <WH3808> ve-lo- not תֵצֵ֥א <WH3318> te-Tze go forth אֱ֝לֹהִ֗ים <WH430> E-lo-Him, ;and wilt not thou O God בְּצִבְאֹתֵֽינוּ׃ <WH6635> be-tziv-'o-Tei-nu. our armies

הָֽבָה־ <WH3051> ha-vah- Give לָּ֣נוּ La-nu עֶזְרָ֣ת <WH5833> 'ez-Rat us help מִצָּ֑ר <WH6862> mitz-Tzar; from trouble וְ֝שָׁ֗וְא <WH7723> ve-Shav, for vain תְּשׁוּעַ֥ת <WH8668> te-shu-'At [is] the help אָדָֽם׃ <WH120> 'a-Dam. of man

בֵּֽאלֹהִ֥ים <WH430> be-lo-Him Through God נַעֲשֶׂה־ <WH6213> na-'a-seh- we shall do חָ֑יִל <WH2428> Cha-yil; valiantly וְ֝ה֗וּא <WH1931> ve-Hu, who יָב֥וּס <WH947> ya-Vus for he [it is that] shall tread down צָרֵֽינוּ׃ <WH6862> tza-Rei-nu. our enemies
